dublin_core.dcvalue: The primary objective of this pilot study was to demonstrate reliable adherence to a group cognitive behavioral CBT therapy protocol when delivered using on line video conferencing as compared with face to face delivery of group CBT A secondary aim was to show comparability of changes in subject depression inventory scores between on line and face to face delivery of group CBT
Comparing telehealth-based and clinic-based group cognitive behavioral therapy for adults with depression and anxiety: a pilot study.
